item.description:
It's been too long since we've had a Boston CiviCRM Meetup!

Come on out to connect to the local CiviCRM community -- whether you're an end user, a consultant, a developer, or a non-profit exploring whether CiviCRM can handle your needs. Hear a report from CiviCon Chicago, hear the latest on CiviCRM 4.0 for Drupal 7, bring your questions, your tips, and your passion for constituent relationship management (ha!).

More details as they emerge. If you have specific requests for agenda items or ground to be covered in a presentation, use the discussion board.
item.how_to_find_us: Just come on up to the fifth floor and come on in.
item.why: CiviCRM is such a powerful constituent management system, and a lot's been going on since we last met.
item.name: Boston CiviCRM Meetup!!
